To stand > To be standing: To not be holding / To not hold
To not grab / To not hold
To be swelling / To be swollen
To not be swelling / To not be swollen
To be swelling / To be swollen (emphatic)

column4: To die (not live) > To be dead
To walk/To stand > To be standing / To be (travelling) on the ground
To swim > To be (travelling) in water
To fly > To be (travelling) in the air
